Stachura, Andrew B. Cooper, Andi Stephens, Neil L. Klaer, Carey R. McGilliard, Iago Mosqueira, Watal M. Iwasaki, Kathryn L. Doering, Andrea M. Havron, Nathan R. Vaughan, LaTreese S. background_text: The r4ss package is a collection of R functions for interacting with Stock Synthesis. It is based on the original work of Ian Stewart begun around 2005 and released as an open source R package in 2009. The package has a long list of authors and has benefited from a large community of users making suggestions and reporting issues.
user_organizations: NOAA Pacific Islands Fisheries Science Center
